channel.title: Gregory S. Moss on Bloomington Playwrights Project
channel.description: Recent content in Gregory S. Moss on Bloomington Playwrights Project

item.title: Billy Witch
item.description: Oliver is hoping that summer camp will change him. Somewhere in the bizarre mixture of secrets and s’mores; sexual exploration and swimming; ghosts, girls and god’s eyes; somewhere in all that mess…Oliver just might grow up. Travel back to a time when we were all innocent in this riotously funny and disarmingly tender Reva Shiner Comedy Award winning play about the awkward (and often hysterical) transformation from youth to adolescence.
